com.microsoft.azure.documentdb

Class Offer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.JsonSerializable
      • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.Resource
        • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.Offer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OfferV2

    public class Offer
extends Resource
    Represents the offer for a resource (collection).

    • Constructor Summary

      Initialize an offer object.

      Initialize an offer object and copy all properties from the other offer.

      Initialize an offer object from json string.
